channel.title: CVE Feed for EnterpriseDB -- EDB Postgres Advanced Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for EnterpriseDB -- EDB Postgres Advanced Server

item.title: CVE-2024-4545|2024-08-01T20:47:40.854Z -- enterprisedb -- edb%20postgres%20advanced%20server
item.description: All versions of EnterpriseDB Postgres Advanced Server (EPAS) from 15.0 prior to 15.7.0 and from 16.0 prior to 16.3.0 may allow users using edbldr to bypass role permissions from pg_read_server_files. This could allow low privilege users to read files to which they would not otherwise have access.

item.title: CVE-2024-4545|2024-06-04T17:55:25.980Z -- enterprisedb -- edb%20postgres%20advanced%20server
item.description: All versions of EnterpriseDB Postgres Advanced Server (EPAS) from 15.0 prior to 15.7.0 and from 16.0 prior to 16.3.0 may allow users using edbldr to bypass role permissions from pg_read_server_files. This could allow low privilege users to read files to which they would not otherwise have access.
